battleGoals.sc-1: Lose a card to negate 5 or more damage.
battleGoals.sc-2: Open a door and end your move action adjacent to a monster in the revealed room.
battleGoals.sc-3: Kill a monster before it takes any actions in the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-4: Kill a monster attacked by an ally earlier in the round.
battleGoals.sc-5: Be adjacent to at least two monsters while standing on a door hex.
battleGoals.sc-6: Kill a monster afflicted by a negative condition.
battleGoals.sc-7: While afflicted by a negative condition, apply any negative condition to a monster.
battleGoals.sc-8: Never collect a money token from end-of-turn looting.
battleGoals.sc-9: Take a rest only on rounds in which an ally is also taking a long or short rest.
battleGoals.sc-10: Kill no elite monsters or bosses during the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-11: Kill a monster you are not adjacent to while adjacent to another monster.
battleGoals.sc-12: Declare a long rest while at your maximum hit point value.
battleGoals.sc-14: Kill three monsters in the same round.
battleGoals.sc-15: Never end your turn adjacent to a monster.
battleGoals.sc-16: Be the first player to become exhausted.
battleGoals.sc-17: Have the most cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-18: Kill the last monster to die in the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-19: Never go first in a round's initiative.
battleGoals.sc-20: Add two cards to your lost pile before your first rest.
battleGoals.sc-21: Except when long resting, never go last in a round's initiative.
battleGoals.sc-22: Apply another negative condition to a monster already afflicted by one.
battleGoals.sc-23: Move using only basic move actions.
battleGoals.sc-24: Kill a monster with an attack with disadvantage.
battleGoals.sc-25: Kill a monster three or more hexes away from you.
battleGoals.sc-26: Never exit a room while money tokens remain in it.
battleGoals.sc-27: Kill a monster and loot its money token on the same turn.
battleGoals.sc-28: Kill a monster and open a door on the same round.
battleGoals.sc-29: End each of your turns adjacent to a wall or obstacle.
battleGoals.sc-30: Never deal the killing blow to a monster.
battleGoals.sc-31: Lose 6 or more hit points in a single round.
battleGoals.sc-32: Perform a loot action while adjacent to at least two monsters.
battleGoals.sc-33: Get attacked by three or more monsters in the same round.
battleGoals.sc-34: Collect three or more money tokens in the same turn.
battleGoals.sc-35: Play two cards for their lost actions on the same turn.
battleGoals.sc-36: Never end your turn adjacent to an ally.
battleGoals.sc-37: Have the fewest cards in your lost pile at the end of the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-38: Move at least one hex on each of your turns (except when long resting).
battleGoals.sc-39: Don't make any attacks in the scenario until after you've taken damage for the first time.
battleGoals.sc-40: Kill a monster when two or more elements are strong or waning.
battleGoals.sc-41: Collect more money tokens than any other player.
battleGoals.sc-42: End each of your turns adjacent to an ally.
battleGoals.sc-43: Kill a monster in a different room (neither of you may be on a doorway tile).
battleGoals.sc-44: Kill two monsters in the same round.
battleGoals.sc-45: Take damage during the same round you take a long rest.
battleGoals.sc-46: Use no potions during the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-47: Never leave a room with a character ally remaining in it.
battleGoals.sc-49: Never leave a hex adjacent to a monster.
battleGoals.sc-50: Do not lose any cards to negate damage during the scenario.
battleGoals.sc-51: Never exit a room with monsters remaining in it.
battleGoals.sc-53: Lose a card to negate 2 or less damage from an attack.
battleGoals.sc-54: Never have fewer than one card in your hand.
